page.title: 15GAMES
page.content: OUTDOOR GAMES. The sort of games we play are mostly sports e.g. football and cricket.There are not many good places to play, we always get chased off the grass near houses in case we break windows.About ten minutes away there is a place called the Kings Head.There is a running track and 4 football pitches. Most of the girls play the old games like skips and running games,such as hide and seek or bulldog. We spend about 3 hours every night playing football or cricket.The girls like rounders or tennis. INDOOR GAMES. The most popular games are board games such as monopoly or cluedo,these are played with dice.Lots of people in our class have computers.
